content:
As always, we're working hard to squash bugs and make various improvements to Aurelia. We've had a number of minor and patch releases over the last week. Below you can read the details of what's been included in those releases.

## Aurelia Validation

 Aurelia Validation continues it's march towards beta. Today's release includes bug-fixes, usability improvements and a long requested feature: validate binding behavior support in custom attribute bindings. You can view the complete list of updates [here](https://github.com/aurelia/validation/milestone/3?closed=1).

## Change Log

### [aurelia-templating 1.1.0](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/compare/1.0.1...v1.1.0) (2016-09-07)

#### Features

* **controller:** expose container ([8af0372](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/8af0372))

### [aurelia-i18n 1.1.2](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/compare/1.1.1...v1.1.2) (2016-09-05)

#### Bug Fixes

* **attribute:** check for undefined controller ([8c6e6bc](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/commit/8c6e6bc))
* *ts:** fix wrong type information ([c86cd3f](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/commit/c86cd3f)), closes [/github.com/aurelia/i18n/issues/136#issuecomment-243419568](https://github.com//github.com/aurelia/i18n/issues/136/issues/issuecomment-243419568)

### [aurelia-ui-virtualization 1.0.0-beta.3.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/compare/1.0.0-beta.3.0.0...v1.0.0-beta.3.0.1) (2016-08-31)

#### Bug Fixes

* **package.json:** change package.json to properly define resources ([4da877f](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/4da877f))
* **virtual-repeat:** make infinite scroll work with initial small page size ([cb135a2](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/cb135a2))
* **virtual-repeat:** make initially hidden elements display correctly ([319cc59](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/319cc59))
* **virtual-repeat:** check for infinite-scroll attribute ([c779738](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/c779738))

#### Code Refactoring

* **all:** rename `virtual-repeat-next` to `infinite-scroll-next` ([b7ff555](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/b7ff555))

#### Features

* **virtual-repeat:** allow use of `.call` on `virtual-repeat-next` ([2d1789b](https://github.com/aurelia/ui-virtualization/commit/2d1789b))

#### BREAKING CHANGES

* all: Renamed `virtual-repeat-next` to
`infinite-scroll-next` to provide more meaning to the attribute.

### [aurelia-binding 1.0.4](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/compare/1.0.3...v1.0.4) (2016-09-07)

#### Bug Fixes

* **StyleObserver:** parse complex styles ([044746f](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/044746f))
* **typescript:** fix doc generation and add missing classes ([347ac4f](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/347ac4f))
* **typings:** remove TypeScript 2.0 syntax ([e9003ee](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/e9003ee))
* *aurelia-binding.d.ts:** improve TypeScript definitions ([604a6a9](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/604a6a9))

#### Features

* **observable:** add propertyName argument ([e7825eb](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/e7825eb))

### [aurelia-anaimator-css 1.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/animator-css/compare/1.0.0...v1.0.1) (2016-09-05)

#### Bug Fixes

* **CssAnimator:** clear event handlers when there's no animation ([7683336](https://github.com/aurelia/animator-css/commit/7683336)), closes [#47](https://github.com/aurelia/animator-css/issues/47)
* **cssRules:** add additional try/catch ([4e21ea8](https://github.com/aurelia/animator-css/commit/4e21ea8)), closes [#40](https://github.com/aurelia/animator-css/issues/40)

### aurelia-polyfills 1.1.0

#### Features

* Add polyfill for Reflect.ownKeys

### aurelia-validation 0.12.3

#### Features

* **RenderInstruction:** add 'kind' property
* **withMessage:** provide access to getDisplayName
* **ValidationParser:** caching and warnings
* **ValidateBindingBehavior:** support custom attributes
* **ValidationRules:** add equals rule

#### Bug Fixes

* **build:** turn on declarations flag
* **ValidationParser:** parse arrow functions

#### Code Refactoring

* **ValidateBindingBehavior:** use controller.container API

### aurelia-cli 0.19.0

#### Features

* add exit error code
* allow `exclude` option in bundle source
